'''Walter Arthur Ronald Wiebe''' (b. September 28, 1912 in [[Rosthern, Saskatchewan]] - d. June 6, 1971 in [[Edmonton]], [[Alberta]]) was a professional [[ice hockey]] player who played 414 games in the [[National Hockey League]]. He won the [[Stanley Cup]] in [[1937â€“38 NHL season|1938]]. He played his entire career with the [[Chicago Blackhawks|Chicago Black Hawks]].
